item.description:
Checks that the customer token gets retained when trying to log them in. This is the case when they are already logged into the session. Attempting to log them back in would result in the context token being changed. Which creates a contextToken de-sync with the App.

As of 6.5.8.9 & 6.6.1.1 the customer token changes in logout & log-in events. So now we are attempting to call the pipeline to sync the token with the app when context-token changes.
